name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and our special sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls and nigiri.

name: Creamy Alfredo Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken.

name: Street Tacos
description: Three tacos filled with marinated beef, fresh cilantro, and onion.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and croutons, served with Caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Ribeye Steak
description: A tender ribeye steak cooked to perfection and served with garlic butter.

name: Fluffy Pancakes
description: Stack of pancakes served with syrup, butter, and fresh berries.

name: Spicy Tonkotsu Ramen
description: Rich and creamy pork broth with noodles, chashu, and a soft-boiled egg.

name: Ice Cream Sundae
description: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry.
